i.name: Granite Shield
i.description: Malphite is shielded by a layer of rock which absorbs damage up to 10% of his maximum Health. If Malphite has not been hit for 10 seconds, this effect recharges.

q.name: Seismic Shard
q.description: Using his primal elemental magic, Malphite sends a shard of the earth through the ground at his foe, dealing damage upon impact and stealing Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

w.name: Brutal Strikes
w.description: Malphite starts to hit with such force that his attacks deal damage to all units in front of him. Passively increases his Armor (this amount is tripled while Granite Shield is active).

e.name: Ground Slam
e.description: Malphite slams the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage based on his Armor as damage and reduces the Attack Speed of enemies for a short duration.

r.name: Unstoppable Force
r.description: Malphite ferociously charges to a location, damaging enemies and knocking them into the air.

riot.name: Granite Shield
riot.description: Malphite is shielded by a layer of rock which absorbs damage up to 10% of his maximum Health. If Malphite has not been hit for 10 seconds, this effect recharges.

i1.name: Granite Shield
i1.blurb: Malphite is shielded by a layer of rock which absorbs damage up to 10% of his maximum Health. If Malphite has not been hit for 10 seconds, this effect recharges.
i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Malphite''' {{tip|shields}} himself for {{sti|health|{{as|10% '''maximum''' health}}}}, refreshing if he has not taken damage in the last {{pp|3|showtype=true|10 to 6|1 to 13}} seconds.

riot.name: Seismic Shard
riot.description: Using his primal elemental magic, Malphite sends a shard of the earth through the ground at his foe, dealing damage upon impact and stealing Movement Speed for 4 seconds.
riot.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> magic damage and steals {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed from the target for {{ e3 }} seconds.

q1.name: Seismic Shard
q1.blurb: Using his primal elemental magic, Malphite sends a shard of the earth through the ground at his foe, dealing damage upon impact and stealing Movement Speed for 4 seconds.
q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Malphite''' sends a rock rolling to the target enemy, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to them upon impact, {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for 4 seconds and gaining {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} equal to the amount the target is {{tip|slow|slowed}} by.
notes: * ''Malphite'' will gain the bonus movement speed for the full duration as long as ''Seismic Shard'' impacts the target.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the damage and the slow but not the bonus movement speed gain.

riot.name: Brutal Strikes
riot.description: Malphite starts to hit with such force that his attacks deal damage to all units in front of him. Passively increases his Armor (this amount is tripled while Granite Shield is active).
riot.tooltip:
Passive: Malphite's armor is increased by {{ e1 }}% ({{ f1 }}). While Granite Shield is active, this bonus is tripled to {{ f4.0 }}% ({{ f3 }}).

Active: Basic attacks deal an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to the target and nearby enemies. Lasts {{ e3 }} seconds.

w1.name: Brutal Strikes
w1.blurb: Malphite starts to hit with such force that his attacks deal damage to all units in front of him. Passively increases his Armor (this amount is tripled while Granite Shield is active).
w1.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Malphite''' gains {{sti|armor|{{as|'''bonus''' armor}}}}, tripled while {{ai|Granite Shield|Malphite}} is active.
w1.leveling: {{st|Bonus Armor|{{as|{{ap|10 to 30}}% armor}}|Increased Armor|{{as|{{ap|10*3 to 30*3}}% armor}}}}
w1.description2: {{sbc|Active:}} For 6 seconds, '''Malphite's''' [[basic attack]]s deal {{tip|physical damage|{{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}}} which splashes to enemies around his target.
notes: * ''Brutal Strikes'' has no cast time and does not interrupt ''Malphite's'' previous orders.

riot.name: Ground Slam
riot.description: Malphite slams the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage based on his Armor as damage and reduces the Attack Speed of enemies for a short duration.
riot.tooltip:
Malphite slams the ground dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to surrounding enemies, reducing their Attack Speed by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

This ability gains damage equal to {{ e3 }}% of Malphite's Armor.

e1.name: Ground Slam
e1.blurb: Malphite slams the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage based on his Armor as damage and reduces the Attack Speed of enemies for a short duration.
e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Malphite''' slams the ground, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies and {{tip|cripple|crippling}} them for 3 seconds.

riot.name: Unstoppable Force
riot.description: Malphite ferociously charges to a location, damaging enemies and knocking them into the air.
riot.tooltip: Malphite charges to target area. Upon his arrival he deals {{ e2 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> magic damage to nearby enemies and knocks them into the air for {{ e3 }} seconds.

r1.name: Unstoppable Force
r1.blurb: Malphite ferociously charges to a location, damaging enemies and knocking them into the air.
r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Malphite''' {{tip|dashes}} {{tip|unstoppable|unstoppably}} to the target location and, upon impact, deals {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies and {{tip|airborne|knocks them up}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
notes: * ''Unstoppable Force'' {{tip|stun|stuns}} enemies hit for the displacement's duration.
* ''Malphite'' can still take damage during ''Unstoppable Force''.
